Kano's girlfriend stuck her crotch into it and began urinating. Sonya swallowed mouthfuls of the warm liquid, trying to suppress the gag reflex and not think about how degrading this action was. Kano's girlfriend pulled Sonya back into a sitting position as she coughed and retched, her eyes filled with seething hatred. Kano's girlfriend stared at her, emotionless.

   "I don't like your attitude." Kano's girlfriend stated flatly. "This tape will be a present for him. Rather than just let him kill you, I thought it would be so much nicer for me to do it and tape it so he can watch the woman he DESPISES break down into a shell of who she once was." Kano's girlfriend went to a nearby table in the room, picking up a small meat cleaver and the blow torch. Sonya's expression went from frightened to completely panicked in about ten seconds. "I thought I would give him a piece of you as a trophy, just so he'll know you're really dead." Kano's girlfriend approached Sonya, putting down the blow torch and grabbing Sonya's left arm. Kano's girlfriend looked at the camera, smiled, and said, "This is for you, babe." she placed the knife at Sonya's wrist, hacking away at flesh and bone. Sonya released several silent screams, often coming out as futile squeaks.

Kano's girlfriend took Sonya's left hand and snapped the wrist backward, then forward, then twisted it, completely freeing it from Sonya's body. Sonya stared in horror at her lost appendage as Kano's girlfriend quickly lit the blow torch and cauterized the wound before Sonya bled too much, a squeal escaping from Sonya's lips. Kano's girlfriend held up the severed hand. "This'll make a nice present, won't it?" she gently placed it in a black box lined with red velvet. "Ooh...You're holding up good." she said in slight amazement. "But let's see how you hold up against this..."
132311222.title: Use her as a toilet and/or smother her.

1323112222.content:
"Before we begin, I'd just like to say that I'd HATE to be you right now." Kano's girlfriend told Sonya as she placed a bowl full of pale yellow liquid next to the shaking woman. "But...I do take delight in teaching grade A BITCHES like you their place." Kano's girlfriend said as she picked up the blood caked knife that she had used throughout the session, surprised to find it still wickedly sharp. Kano's girlfriend walked over to Sonya, giggling maliciously at the uncomfortable squirming of the once strong and proud Sonya Blade. "Now..." Kano's girlfriend smiled, running the knife along Sonya's cheek, "Why don't we do something about that pretty blonde hair of yours?" Kano's girlfriend placed the tip of the knife against the base of Sonya's hairline, plunging it in as far as it would go until she felt the scrape of bone. Kano's girlfriend slowly cut around Sonya's dirt and blood covered, cobweb infested hair, collected in a now messy ponytail. When she had cut as far as Sonya's ears on both sides, she stopped, pulled the knife out of the poor woman's scalp, and let the warm metal hit the floor as blood began to spurt from the crude cut. Kano's girlfriend grabbed Sonya's ponytail, making sure her grip was tight. "Hey Sonya..." she shouted, "Think fast!" Kano's girlfriend pulled as hard as she could, tearing away Sonya's hair and separating Sonya's scalp from her head in one quick motion. The fresh wound began pouring blood as Kano's girlfriend picked up the bowlful of liquid. "And now some freshly squeezed lemon juice, for flavor."
         "LEMON WHA-!" Sonya's brain screamed as a new fire was ignited on her bleeding head, the hellfire taking away all rational thought as she sat there, suffering in silent agony. She was in so much pain, she didn't even feel Kano's girlfriend run the blowtorch against her head to stop her from losing too much blood.
         "I'm going to take you apart piece by piece." Kano's girlfriend announced. "Hello?!" she shouted, snapping her fingers in front of Sonya. Sonya's eyes managed to give a weak flutter of acknowledgment. "Oh, that's good. VERY good..."

13231122221.content:
Sonya was so weak. Her body had lost blood, it was burnt, it was tortured, it was mutilated. She just wanted to die but death would not come. as her eyes fluttered open Kano's twisted girlfriend said, "Apologize to Kano for being a bitch, do it now."

Sonya just wanted it to end, she had no fight left in her. She turned to face the camera. "I am sorry fro being a bitch, I'm sorry."

Her evil tormentor laughed, "Good job bitch, those were your last words." As she said that she forced open Sonya's jaw and used a pair of pliers to grab her tongue. She forced it out of her mouth over Sonya's pathetic wails. She took a knife and then reached into the mouth and stabbed Sonya's tongue and ripped the serrated edge all the way around the tongue. It was hanging by a part just in the middle and with a firm yank the tongue flopped out.

Sonya screamed, blood gushing from her mouth.

"Open your mouth slut! I need to cauterize it, your losing too much blood."

Sonya kept her mouth but Kano's girlfriend was too strong and soon forced her jaw open and jammed the blood torch in and lit it. Sonya screamed and then slumped unconscious from the agony. Sonya's breathing was shallow, she didn't have long now - what would be the possible final torture?
13231122221.title: Cut out Sonya's tongue.

13231122222.content:
Sonya gurgled in agony, not sure where she was anymore. Tears pricked her eyes as she realized that she would most definitely die in this room some time tonight. Kano's girlfriend smirked.
         "Oh, Sonya..." she cradled Sonya's chin in her manicured hand, "Would you like to take a look at yourself?"
         "NO! Leave me alone you monster! Leave me!" Sonya wailed. Kano's girlfriend shoved a dirt stained hand mirror near Sonya's face.
         "Look!" Sonya squeezed her eyes shut and turned her head away. "Look!" Kano's girlfriend demanded more harshly than before, "Or I'll CUT OFF YOUR EYELIDS!" Not wanting to make her death worse than it was, Sonya cracked open one eye. Her eyes shot open at the first glance of the monstrous form before her. Her skull was pure white, save for an odd bloodstain. Rivers of deep red ichor flowed down from her hairline, covering her face in crusted paths. A few blonde hairs hung down limply on her forehead where the blade had missed. Her lips were dry, chapped and pale, a small trickle of blood running down to her chin. Heavy rings of black circled her sunken eyes in contrast to her ghost white skin. She appeared dead, like a mannequin, just as pale, just as lifeless.
         "I don't know about you, but I find your face to be far too unmarred." Kano's girlfriend remarked casually. She tapped at Sonya's nose with the toe of her boot. "We should fix that." Before Sonya could protest, a spiked heel came down on her left cheek, leaving a deep puncture wound that spouted ribbons of blood. Kano's girlfriend dragged the rough sole of her boot across Sonya's face, rubbing her face raw and tearing up her skin. Kano's girlfriend put extra pressure in her strokes over Sonya's nose, being rewarded with the satisfying crunch of breaking cartilage. Kano's girlfriend gave a firm stomp to Sonya's nose, relishing in smearing streaks of crimson ichor across the proud woman's face. Sonya cried out in anguish as her face was ripped into a bloody mess, chunks of dirt and rubber tainting her flesh.
         "Please... Stop..." Sonya gurgled weakly before a foot came down viciously onto Sonya's mouth, chipping one of her pearly colored front teeth. The aggressive stomp caused Sonya's top teeth to land a devastating cut into her chapped bottom lip as well as slicing cleanly through the tip of her tongue. Sonya choked as she howled in agony, her cries more like that of an animal's than a human's. Blood ran in rivers down her lips, dribbling out of the corners of her mouth as her ivory teeth were stained with the evidence of her torture. Sonya gagged as the irony liquid coated her tongue and bolts of pain rippled through her. Sonya swallowed reflexively as her torment dragged on, her heart pounding in her chest.
         "You couldn't imagine the enjoyment I'm getting out of this right now!" Kano's girlfriend laughed wickedly as she landed her sole onto Sonya's left eye. Sonya tensed and snapped her eyes shut as the shoe came down on her eyelid. Sonya choked, then heaved, then screeched as her sparkling blue eye was ground back into its socket, her eyelid and the surrounding skin becoming black as night with the assault. A river of blood trickled down through the swollen socket from her ruined eye.
         "G-G-God..." Sonya moaned with heaving, choking breaths as she spit up more blood.
         "There. Now your face matches the rest of you!" Kano's girlfriend smiled with sadistic delight. "But I think we may need to finish up soon. You're getting really boring now that you're nearly dead from trauma." Kano's girlfriend pouted. "I've already taken your hand and your hair, so I don't see why I don't take the rest of you. I could just skin you, or, if I don't feel like slaving on these floors with a mop and bucket for weeks cleaning up the blood and piss that YOU so inconsiderately left all over the place I could boil you alive in a pot until your flesh melts off your bones..."

15321.content:
Sonya Blade dressed in her tight form-fitting spandex attire was preparing herself for a fight against her mortal enemy Kano, when all of the sudden a strange green pipe suddenly burst forth from the ground in front of her. Curiousity got the better of her, and Sonya walked up to the pipe and leaned over the top to peer inside. Seeing nothing there but darkness, she moved to back away, but a loose rock under her boot gave way causing her to slip and fall head first into the dark chasm below.

Sonya fell screaming through the dark pipe until she landed with a thud on her ass in a strange land she had never seen before. The pipe above her which had teleported her to this bizarre world vanished (never to reappear again) leaving the busty blonde soldier stranded in this strange world of giant Mushrooms.

As she got back up to her feet and brushed herself off, Sonya began to look around and try to find someone who could tell her where she is, and more importantly how she might get back home. It didn't take long before someone caught sight of her. "Hey, you there!" shouted a ____ voice.

info.description:
This story is going to be all about having horrible things happen to Sonya Blade. She can be killed during Mortal Kombat or outside of Mortal Kombat. She can be abused, raped, tortured and mutilated in anyway you choose. She can be beaten, used as a human toilet, shrunk, smothered and more. Feel free to add. Story will be third person but if you want to choose a different perspective you can.

No rules expect no male/male action.
